member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Files.ChunkedUploadSource.#ctor(WikiClientLibrary.Sites.WikiSite,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initialize an instance from a .
member.param: The destination site to upload the file.
The seekable stream containing the file to be uploaded. The upload will be performed starting from the current position.

Optional file name. This parameter can be null, where a dummy file name will be used; otherwise, it should be a valid file name. If the name has file extension, the content will be validated by server. However, the name can be different from the actual uploaded file.
member.exception: does not support seeking - or - has met EOF.

member.name: M:WikiClientLibrary.Pages.Parsing.WikiSiteExtensions.ParseContentAsync(WikiClientLibrary.Sites.WikiSite,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,WikiClientLibrary.Pages.Parsing.ParsingOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Parsing the specific page content and/or summary, gets HTML and more information. (MediaWiki 1.12)
member.param: The MediaWiki site to execute the request on.
The content to parse.
The summary to parse. Can be null.

Act like the wikitext is on this page. This only really matters when parsing links to the page itself or subpages, or when using magic words like {{PAGENAME}}. If null is given, the default value "API" will be used.
The content model name of the text specified in . null makes the server to infer content model from .
The language (variant) used to render the content. E.g. "zh-cn", "zh-tw". specify content to use this wiki's content language.
Options for parsing.
The cancellation token that will be checked prior to completing the returned task.
